text.section: If a voter fails to respond to a confirmation notice under § 3-502(c) of this subtitle, the voter's name shall be placed into inactive status on the statewide voter registration list.
An inactive voter who fails to vote in an election in the period ending with the second general election shall be removed from the statewide voter registration list.
Registrants placed into inactive status may not be counted for official administrative purposes including establishing precincts and reporting official statistics.
